flavorText: It smarts more than the average bear.
name: Really Epic Punch
originalText: Target creature you control gets +2/+2 if it's a host or has augment. Then it fights target creature you don't control.

rulings.text: You must be able to target a creature you control and a creature you don’t control to cast Really Epic Punch. Note that you can target any creature you control, even if it isn’t a host or doesn’t have augment. It won’t get +2/+2, but it will still fight.
A combined host/augment creature will get +2/+2 because it has augment.
The +2/+2 is permanent. It doesn’t wear off as the turn ends.
